reference.title: AWS (Amazon Web Services)
reference.shortdesc: The ZenPacks.zenoss.AWS ZenPack monitors Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) server instances.

section.p: Information is collected through a combination of AWS EC2 and CloudWatch APIs. When you install this ZenPack, the /AWS/EC2 device class is added to your instance. A single device in the EC2 class, EC2Manager, represents your EC2 account. All instances and instance types are contained in the EC2 account manager.
section.note: This ZenPack supercedes ZenPacks.zenoss.ZenAWS, which was installed by default on versions of prior to version 4.2.4. Please remove ZenPacks.zenoss.ZenAWS before installing ZenPacks.zenoss.AWS.
